com.stockticker.ui

Class HistoryCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stockticker.ui.HistoryCard

  • public class HistoryCard
extends Object
    History Screen for Stock Ticker Portfolio Manager Provides StockHistory on a selected Stock between a specified date range. Displays the details in a JTable.
    Author:
    prwallace

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HistoryCard(ViewStockTicker.OperateStockTicker operate)
      Constructs the HistoryCard object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearHistory()
      Clears the Table of its content
      void displayHistory(List<StockHistory> history)
      Adds the List into the tables model, which is then displayed in the table.
      JPanel getCard()
      Gets/returns the Card panel
      Date getEndDate()
      Gets/returns the end Date of the date range set by user.
      Date getStartDate()
      Gets/returns the start Date of the date range set by the user.
      void setCard()
      Adds the Card JPanel as main panel for this UI screen and adds its child JPanel's to this Card.
      void setHistoryTable()
      Adds the stock history table to its JPanel
      void setTableBorder(String title)
      Adds a title border around the table, the title is set to the argument String.

        public final void setCard()
        Adds the Card JPanel as main panel for this UI screen and adds its child JPanel's to this Card. Makes method calls to build its child components.

        Parameters:
